I opened a pull request. Feel free to share your thoughts.

It basically adds this kind of operation:
auto train = GradientDescentOptimizer(0.01).Minimize(scope, {loss});

You can see a detailed example here: https://github.com/theflofly/tensorflow/blob/optimizer-cc-issue-9837/tensorflow/cc/training/optimizer_test.cc in the second function.

I put some TODO(theflofly) listing some improvements. I will add other optimizers and some gradients operations, then I'll work on these TODOs.

We can easily share the work, so if someone wants to work either on the TODOs, gradients or optimizers please create an issue and ping me so that we don't work on the same feature.

I opened a pull request. Feel free to share your thoughts.

```auto train = GradientDescentOptimizer(0.01).Minimize(scope, {loss});```

You can see a detailed example here: https://github.com/theflofly/tensorflow/blob/optimizer-cc-issue-9837/tensorflow/cc/training/optimizer_test.cc in the second function.

I put some TODO(theflofly) listing some improvements. I will add other optimizers and some gradients operations, then I'll work on these TODOs.
